name: Get out of my house!
description:
Our submission for the Ludum Dare 33 Jam "You are the Monster". You are a monster and your house is attacked by adventurers!

Throw everything you can at them to kick them out!

The team :

Code : Vladirien (Twitter) & Palapapaa (Twitter)

Graphics : Lysero

Music : Nemix (Twitter ; Soundcloud)
